s.text: Controversy 1: The Los Angeles Times asks whether it was rape or, "as dozens of male respondents to local newspapers and talk radio programs suggest, the answer to every schoolboy's dream."
Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu came to the United States to plead for Jewish unity.
The charitable view: Russia is playing good cop , while the United States plays bad cop.
The Los Angeles Times linked the massacre to similar bloodshed in Algeria and blamed it on poor security.
Best argument against it: Kids will lose their laptops.

3) The Wall Street Journal accelerated the backspin against military action with a Wednesday piece criticizing "facile Washington commentary" that exaggerates the ease of deposing or crippling Saddam Hussein through force.
